column1: Uchi////We first ordered the cold sake. Weirdly
column2: the hot and cold sake are both $3 during that time
column3: but the cold sake is served by the glass. Okay
column4: fine. We ordered the happy hour pork belly dish. It was delicious but small. We ordered the walu walu. Again
column5: wonderful but small. Then we ordered the sake crudo and the crispy tuna. When ordering the tuna
column6: the waiter told us that it would take about five minutes to make. We said
column8: the waiter came by to tell us it was coming
column9: but the bar was really backed up. Forty minutes later
column10: the waiter came by to tell us that the chef said it would be "two more minutes".
